Name: OnimasuJump
Notes: A stone box enemy that jumps between its path points. By default, the jumping velocity is so low that the jump is barely noticable. The direction it rotates to while moving can be configured as well.

Obj_arg0.Name: Pause Delay
Obj_arg0.Description: How long it pauses before moving. Default is 90.

Obj_arg1.Name: Move Time
Obj_arg1.Description: How long it takes to move to the next point. This also affects the jump velocity. Default is 30.

Obj_arg2.Name: Comet Pause Delay
Obj_arg2.Description: How long it pauses before moving during a Double Time comet. Default is 45.

Obj_arg3.Name: Comet Move Time
Obj_arg3.Description: How long it takes to move to the next point during a Double Time Comet. This also affects the jump velocity. Default is 15.

Point_arg0.Name: Turn Direction
Point_arg0.Description: Specifies how to turn and move at this point.

Values.Notes: Rotates backwards & remain at point before moving.

SW_A.Description: If used, it won't move until this switch gets activated once.

SW_PARAM.Description: Animations, velocity and update rates are adjusted with ParamScale while this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Objects of this class can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
